cyclone.name: CLAUDETTE
cyclone.current_location: about 250 mi (400 km) south-southeast of Halifax, Nova Scotia
cyclone.trajectory: Continuing northeast, then north-northeast toward Nova Scotia and Newfoundland, expected to become post-tropical and pass over or very near southeastern Newfoundland

weather_observation.impacted_coast: South-central to eastern Nova Scotia and southeastern Newfoundland

weather_observation.rainfall: None significant expected at the port
